sentences.en: A clause in the contract had been left purposely vague.
sentences.cn: 合同中有一个条款被故意定得模棱两可。

sentences.en: Bertha purposely spoke in a somewhat formal and elaborate manner.
sentences.cn: 伯莎故事讲得带点儿文绉绉的学究气.

sentences.en: Brad was being purposely bumpkinish reacting unfavorably to Boylan's mannered elegance.
sentences.cn: 勃雷德有意乡里乡气的,来对付博伊兰矫揉造作的高雅.

sentences.en: He didn't purposely make things difficult for you.
He purposely made those remarks in order to save face.
sentences.cn: 他因爱面子而故意说那些话.

sentences.en: He purposely made those remarks to save his face.
sentences.cn: 他故意说那些话以保全他的面子.

sentences.en: He sat down, purposely avoiding her gaze.
sentences.cn: 他坐了下来，有意避开她的目光。

sentences.en: He should fear he was purposely deceiving him with empty promises.
sentences.cn: 他会担心他是故意用空话来搪塞他.

sentences.en: She purposely made the dress larger to allow for shrinking when it was washed.
sentences.cn: 她故意把衣服做大一些,以防洗时缩水.

sentences.en: She purposely made the dress larger to allowshrinkage.
sentences.cn: 他故意把衣服做大一些,以防(洗时)缩水.

sentences.en: She purposely sat in the outside seat.
sentences.cn: 她故意坐在外面座位上.

sentences.en: The most ridiculous grimaces were purposely or unconsciously indulged in.
sentences.cn: 故意或者无心地扮出最滑稽可笑的鬼脸.

sentences.en: The suggestive notation has been chosen purposely.
sentences.cn: 这个有启发性的符号是特意选择的.

sentences.en: They had purposely postponed going to London till the autumn.
sentences.cn: 他们故意把伦敦之行延期到秋天.
